data.title: Online World of Wrestling
data.text:
Bass Brothers

Title History

INSERT

Career Highlights

1970-71: Sam Bass managed Percy (Jimmy Hyde) & Woodrow Bass (Jim White) in the Alabama territory for promoter Billy Golden..

1972-73: Maw Bass (Mae Weston) managed Roy Bass (Roy Klein) & Donnie Bass in the Kentucky area for promoter Phil Golden…

1973-74: Maw Bass managed Ronnie & Donnie Bass, then later it was Donnie & Bobby Bass in the Gulf Coast area for Lee Fields

Spring 1975: Sam Bass (Real Name: Frank Bass) managed Ron & Don Bass in the Tennessee (Gulas) and Knoxville (Fuller) areas..

May 14, 1974 – GCCW: Ken Lucas & Mike Boyette defeated The Bass Brothers (Don Bass & Ron Bass) by count-out.

May 21, 1974 – GCCW: The Bass Brothers (Don Bass & Ron Bass) defeated The Mysterious Medics (Mysterious Medic #1 & Mysterious Medic #2) in the quarter-finals. Duke Miller & The Wrestling Pro defeated The Bass Brothers (Don Bass & Ron Bass) in the semi-finals.

May 28, 1974 – GCCW: The Bass Brothers (Don Bass & Ron Bass) defeated Jack Donovan & Mike Boyette.

March 31, 1975 – NWA Mid-America: Don Bass & Ron Bass defeated Eddie Marlin & Tojo Yamamoto.

May 20, 1975 – NWA Mid-America: Al Greene & Phil Hickerson defeated Don Bass & Ron Bass.

June 16, 1975 – CWF: Adnan Kassie & Joey Rossi defeated The Bass Brothers (Don Bass & Ron Bass).

June 25, 1975 – CWF: Danny Little Bear & Pepper Gomez defeated The Bass Brothers (Don Bass & Ron Bass).

June 26, 1975 – CWF: Mike Graham & Tiger Conway Jr. defeated The Bass Brothers (Don Bass & Ron Bass).

June 30, 1975 – CWF: The Bass Brothers (Don Bass & Ron Bass) defeated Joey Rossi & Pepper Gomez.

July 2, 7, 1975 – CWF: The Bass Brothers (Don Bass & Ron Bass) defeated Bob Backlund & Pepper Gomez.

July 9, 1975 – CWF: Mike Graham & Tiger Conway Jr. defeated The Bass Brothers (Don Bass & Ron Bass).

July 21, 1975 – CWF: Mike George & Mike Graham defeated The Bass Brothers (Don Bass & Ron Bass).

July 23, 1975 – CWF: Adnan Kassie & Joey Rossi defeated The Bass Brothers (Don Bass & Ron Bass).

July 28, 1975 – CWF: Mike Graham & Omar Negro defeated The Bass Brothers (Don Bass & Ron Bass).

July 30, 1975 – CWF: Mike Graham & Tiger Conway Jr. defeated The Bass Brothers (Don Bass & Ron Bass).

August 5, 1975 – CWF: Mike Graham & Pepper Gomez defeated The Bass Brothers (Don Bass & Ron Bass).

August 13, 1975 – CWF: Rick Gibson & Tony Charles defeated The Bass Brothers (Don Bass & Ron Bass).

August 16, 1975 – CWF: Mike Graham & Rick Gibson defeated The Bass Brothers (Don Bass & Ron Bass).

Maw Bass & her boys were involved in a heel vs heel feud with J.C. Dykes & his Mighty Yankees (Curtis Smith & Mike McManus).

Maw Bass certainly didn’t mind smacking her sons Ronnie and Donnie around when things weren’t going the Bass’ way..

~~~The Bass Brothers often used Maw Bass’ “loaded purse” as a weapon to gain the advantage in their matches..
